titles: A vindication of His Majesties government and judicatures in Scotland from some aspersions thrown on them by scandalous pamphlets and news-books, and especially with relation to the late Earl of Argiles Process.
author: Mackenzie, George, Sir, 1636-1691.
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,
notes: Attributed to Sir George Mackenzie by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
"Reflections on the Earl of Argil's Process" begins on p. 18.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
keywords: Church and state --  Great Britain --  17th century.
